articles.title: Black female WWII unit recognized with congressional honor - Associated Press
articles.description: BOSTON (AP) — The House voted Monday to award the only all-female, Black unit to serve in Europe during World War II with the Congressional Gold Medal.  The 422-0 vote follows a long-running campaign to recognize the 6888th Central Postal Directory  Battalion.
